cause.description:
The Painted Turtle is a Hole In The Wall camp in Lake Hughes, CA. It is the most amazing place in the whole wide world and caters to a different group of outstanding kids every week of the summer, as well as family weekends throughout the year!!
check it out more at: thepaintedturtle.org
1. Happiness has no limitations
cause.mission: bring the magic, love and pure joy to amazing kids that deserve it more than anything!
cause.name: The Painted Turtle Camp
